testcase.name: Wrong data provision On Practice Form
testcase.system-out: Given I go to the Practice Form page........................................passed When I type in Name as a numeric value "796543".............................passed And I type in Last Name "Chatterjee"........................................passed And I type in wrong Email Id "ssl-27hotmail.com"............................passed And I select Gender Male....................................................passed And I type in wrong mobile number with less that ten numbers "074244".......passed And I click submit button...................................................passed Then there shall appear on the places a red highlight where the incorrect data is provided.passed

testcase.name: To verify Alert button
testcase.system-out: Given that I am on the Alerts page..........................................passed When I click On the second button...........................................passed Then after five seconds a message shall appear This alert appeared after five seconds.passed And I click Ok..............................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given that I am on the Tool Tips page.......................................passed When I hover over the Hover me to see green button..........................passed And I hover over the input space Hover me to see............................passed Then the hover over messages should display.................................passed

testcase.name: To verify Date calculation and selection
testcase.system-out: Given that I am on the Date Picker page.....................................passed When calculate the date exactly a month from today date.....................passed And I select the correct year using the date picker.........................passed And I select the correct month using the date picker........................passed And I select the correct day using the date picker..........................passed Then the chosen date shall be shown on the Select Date section..............passed
